4706.verse: ۞ قَالَ|He said,|96|127|309$فَمَا|`Then what|99|162|132$خَطْبُكُمْ|(is) your mission,|133|196|9804$أَيُّهَا ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ|O messengers?`|159|190|9805$

4709.verse: مُّسَوَّمَةً|Marked|89|166|8668$عِندَ رَبِّكَ|by your Lord|108|261|16141$لِلْمُسْرِفِينَ|for the transgressors.`|172|248|8046$

4712.verse: وَتَرَكْنَا|And We left|98|115|8864$فِيهَآ|therein|66|101|253$ءَايَةً|a Sign|61|96|2339$لِّلَّذِينَ|for those who|112|147|750$يَخَافُونَ|fear|92|127|4859$ٱلْعَذَابَ|the punishment|122|139|1442$ٱلْأَلِيمَ|the painful.|95|95|8290$

4714.verse: فَتَوَلَّىٰ|But he turned away|151|177|6564$بِرُكْنِهِۦ|with his supporters|146|198|16143$وَقَالَ|and said,|80|132|1089$سَـٰحِرٌ|`A magician|99|151|14763$أَوْ|or|41|67|154$مَجْنُونٌ|a madman.`|100|100|15581$

4715.verse: فَأَخَذْنَـٰهُ|So We took him|124|141|13461$وَجُنُودَهُۥ|and his hosts|108|142|13462$فَنَبَذْنَـٰهُمْ|and threw them|125|159|13463$فِى|into|48|82|89$ٱلْيَمِّ|the sea,|75|109|6765$وَهُوَ|while he|74|91|305$مُلِيمٌ|(was) blameworthy.|152|152|14712$

4719.verse: فَعَتَوْاْ|But they rebelled|133|154|16149$عَنْ|against|68|109|1105$أَمْرِ|(the) Command|122|163|10521$رَبِّهِمْ|(of) their Lord,|118|159|54$فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ|so seized them|119|140|4598$ٱلصَّـٰعِقَةُ|the thunderbolt|123|212|530$وَهُمْ|while they|88|266|256$يَنظُرُونَ|were looking.|107|196|1830$

4720.verse: فَمَا|Then not|80|86|132$ٱسْتَطَـٰعُواْ|they were able|119|132|1902$مِن|to|50|63|53$قِيَامٍ|stand|57|70|16150$وَمَا|and not|71|84|46$كَانُواْ|they could|90|103|94$مُنتَصِرِينَ|help themselves.|131|137|16151$

4721.verse: وَقَوْمَ|And the people|120|138|12771$نُوحٍ|(of) Nuh|75|110|4641$مِّن قَبْلُ‌ۖ|before them;|106|141|250$إِنَّهُمْ|indeed, they|103|138|106$كَانُواْ|were|69|104|94$قَوْمًا|a people|76|94|3073$فَـٰسِقِينَ|defiantly disobedient.|162|162|7658$

4722.verse: وَٱلسَّمَآءَ|And the Heaven|126|163|199$بَنَيْنَـٰهَا|We constructed it|140|214|16036$بِأَيْيْدٍ|with strength,|114|188|16152$وَإِنَّا|and indeed, We|123|160|682$لَمُوسِعُونَ|(are) surely (its) Expanders.|207|207|16153$

4723.verse: وَٱلْأَرْضَ|And the earth,|117|141|2280$فَرَشْنَـٰهَا|We have spread it,|146|194|16154$فَنِعْمَ|how excellent|111|159|9441$ٱلْمَـٰهِدُونَ|(are) the Spreaders.|156|180|16155$

4706.verse: [Abraham] said, "Then what is your business [here], O messengers?"

4707.verse: They said, "Indeed, we have been sent to a people of criminals

4708.verse: To send down upon them stones of clay,

4709.verse: Marked in the presence of your Lord for the transgressors."

4710.verse: So We brought out whoever was in the cities of the believers.

4711.verse: And We found not within them other than a [single] house of Muslims.

4712.verse: And We left therein a sign for those who fear the painful punishment.

4713.verse: And in Moses [was a sign], when We sent him to Pharaoh with clear authority.

4714.verse: But he turned away with his supporters and said," A magician or a madman."

4715.verse: So We took him and his soldiers and cast them into the sea, and he was blameworthy.

4716.verse: And in 'Aad [was a sign], when We sent against them the barren wind.

4717.verse: It left nothing of what it came upon but that it made it like disintegrated ruins.

4718.verse: And in Thamud, when it was said to them, "Enjoy yourselves for a time."

4719.verse: But they were insolent toward the command of their Lord, so the thunderbolt seized them while they were looking on.

4720.verse: And they were unable to arise, nor could they defend themselves.

4721.verse: And [We destroyed] the people of Noah before; indeed, they were a people defiantly disobedient.

4722.verse: And the heaven We constructed with strength, and indeed, We are [its] expander.

4723.verse: And the earth We have spread out, and excellent is the preparer.

4724.verse: And of all things We created two mates; perhaps you will remember.

4725.verse: So flee to Allah. Indeed, I am to you from Him a clear warner.

4726.verse: And do not make [as equal] with Allah another deity. Indeed, I am to you from Him a clear warner.
